content:
Fare payments at RTA Parking Meters, RTA Bus and Water Bus
Eligibility for RTA Monthly Pass/Product
Know more
For you, the light is always green
Use your Go4it Card as the RTA Nol Card and a credit card
Use your Go4it Gold credit card to make fare payments on the RTA transit network and parking meters and also for purchases and cash withdrawals.
You'll also get a host of other benefits including:
Access to Regular class and fare payment from Nol Tag ID
Ability to make payments at RTA parking meters, bus and water bus
Eligibility for RTA's monthly pass/product
Learn more about how you can top up your Nol card in convenient ways

content:
Dubai Ferry
Free rides on Dubai Ferry
Experience the scenic sites and greatest landmarks of Dubai
Know more
Free rides on Dubai Ferry
Experience the scenic sites and greatest landmarks of Dubai
The Dubai Ferry takes round trips on the waterfront route providing incredible views of landmarks such as Old Bastakiya, Gold Souk, Jumeirah beach, World Islands, Burj Al Arab and others and is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities.
Your Go4it Card entitles you and one accompanying guest to a free ride on the Dubai Ferry.
The exclusive rides for Go4it Cardholders are as per the below schedule.
Route
Description
Schedule*
FR3
Round trip from Al Ghubaiba water transport station up to the area close to Burj Al Arab
2:30pm (for one hour), First Saturday of the month
Round trip from Al Ghubaiba water transport station up to the area close to Burj Al Arab
2:30pm (for one hour), Second Saturday of the month
FR4

2:30pm (for one hour), Third Saturday of the month
Round trip from Marina Mall water transport station up to the area close to Atlantis on Palm Jumeirah
2:30pm (for one hour), Fourth Saturday of the month
Terms and conditions
All passengers are requested to be at the location no later than 15 minutes before departure.

Introducing the new Credit Shield Pro, our enhanced insurance product, underwritten by Abu Dhabi National Insurance Company, that brings you even more benefits and extended coverage.
Key features
0.99% monthly fee of your card's outstanding balance
Up to  300,000 decease cover per cardholder
 100 pay out per day in case of hospitalization
